attributes.action: Hold a referendum on re-joining the EU
attributes.additional_details: To prevent further economic harm to this country, it’s time to rejoin the EU
attributes.background:
It is clear that Brexit is not working.  It is costing the country almost a billion pounds a week.

Fuel shortages, energy crisis, HGV driver shortages, labour shortages, hospitality sector decimated.

It’s clear Brexit isn’t working.  People were mislead and it’s clear the leave campaign lied.
